frozen_definition.name: Retainify
frozen_definition.signal_source: Educational studies show students 'spend hours studying, only to forget everything days later' and 'rereading same material over and over, never really stuck'
frozen_definition.description: Gentle spaced repetition app that sends non-intrusive review reminders for any content you're learning, without complex flashcard creation
frozen_definition.target_user: Students and lifelong learners frustrated with poor retention despite significant study time investment
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Research shows dramatic retention drops without review, students report exhaustion from cramming with poor results
core_loop: Snap photo or type key concept learned
Get gentle reminder notification after optimal interval
Mark as remembered or needs review
frozen_definition.differentiation: Effortless capture vs. complex flashcard creation, focuses on gentle nudges vs. aggressive testing
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited concepts, advanced scheduling, study analytics, and cross-device sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for 20 concepts, premium for unlimited and advanced features
